content: 🐸✨pocket frog✨🐸 crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks important info you may sell your creations but not my pattern please do not share my pattern except by linking the url credit me as the designer when you post i can t wait to see what you make i m most reachable by facebook messenger and instagram for help and to show me your creations all my socials are available here this pattern uses us terminology we used parfait chunky glitter 5 25 mm 14 mm eyes round 1 magic_ring with 6sc 6 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 single_crochet increase bob single_crochet increase single_crochet bob single_crochet increase single_crochet increase single_crochet 16 round 4 2sc increase ×3 2sc decrease 3sc 18 round 5 18 single_crochet 18 place safety eyes in bob stitches round 6 4sc bob 7sc bob 5sc 18 round 7 18sc 18 round 8 6sc bob 4sc bob 6sc 18 blo remaining rounds round 9 18 single_crochet 18 round 10 9 decrease 9 fo close
